metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19763 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
There is a heap-based buffer over-read at writer.c (function:write_png_to_file) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19763` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-2.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsixel package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
